fields.description:
Due to API changes in https://github.com/janvennemann/ti.admob/pull/1 the 
PR https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.admob/pull/89 need to updated.

*Changes need to done:* 
Update the Android Admob sdk & tagforChildDirectedTreatment and testDeviceIdentifiers are not on a "per request" basis anymore and instead apply to all requests so we should move these options to the module.
[Note: check PR https://github.com/janvennemann/ti.admob/pull/1 for more detail]
fields.summary: Update GoogleAd SDK & Fix the parity issue wrt iOS (MOD-2649)
